content: *bbaabbyy ddoollll ppaatttteerrnn sold sseeppaarraatteellyy* this pattern is created byy cchhaassssiittyy ooqquueennddoo iiff yyoouu hhaavvee aannyy pprroobblleemmss wwiitthh tthhiiss ppaatttteerrnn pplleeaassee eemmaaiill mmee at chassityoquendo@aol com ffoorr mmoorree ppaatttteerrnnss vviissiitt 77ppoollkkaaddoottss eettssyy ccoomm tttthhhhiiiissss ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiissss ffffoooorrrr nnnnoooonnnnccccoooommmmmmmmeeeerrrrcccciiiiaaaallll uuuusssseeee oooonnnnllllyyyy pppplllleeeeaaaasssseeee ddddoooo nnnnooootttt sssseeeellllllll mmmmyyyy ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiinnnn aaaannnnyyyy wwwwaaaayyyy sssshhhhaaaappppeeee oooorrrr ffffoooorrrrmmmm bbbbuuuutttt yyyyoooouuuu aaaarrrreeee mmmmoooorrrreeee tttthhhhaaaannnn wwwweeeellllccccoooommmmeeee ttttoooo sssseeeellllllll aaaannnnyyyy ffffiiiinnnniiiisssshhhheeeedddd pppprrrroooodddduuuucccctttt yyyyoooouuuu hhhhaaaavvvveeee mmmmaaaaddddeeee tttthhhhaaaannnnkkkk yyyyoooouuuu mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss nnnneeeeeeeeddddeeeedddd this bag was made of caron s simply soft but you can use any yarn you choose you can one color for all or split it into 2 colors crochet hook size g yarn needle for weaving in ends bbbbaaaagggg with bottom color work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet twice in next st around 18 sts round 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet twice in next st around 24 sts round 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet twice in next st around 30 sts round 6 single_crochet 4 single_crochet twice in next st around 36 sts round 7 single_crochet 5 single_crochet twice in next st around 42 sts round 8 single_crochet 6 single_crochet twice in next st around 48 sts round 9 single_crochet 7 single_crochet twice in next st around 54 sts round 10 single_crochet 8 single_crochet twice in next st around 60 sts round 11 single_crochet 9 single_crochet twice in next st around 66 sts rnd12 single_crochet 10 single_crochet twice in next st around 72 sts round 13 single_crochet 11 single_crochet twice in next st around 78 sts this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 14 single_crochet 12 single_crochet twice in next st around 84 sts round 15 single_crochet 13 single_crochet twice in next st around 90 sts round 16 single_crochet 14 single_crochet twice in next st around 96 sts round 17 single_crochet 15 single_crochet twice in next st around 102 sts fasten_off attach top color with slip_stitch to any single_crochet rnd1 ch3 2 double_crochet in same st skip 3 sts 3 double_crochet in next st around until the last 5 single_crochet for the last cluster skip 2 single_crochet 3 double_crochet in next st skip last 2 single_crochet slip_stitch to third chain in chain 3 round 2-6 slip_stitch into next double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet continue in this pattern working 3 double_crochet in the middle double_crochet of each cluster slip_stitch in third chain of chain 3 round 7 slip_stitch in next 4 double_crochet and in space between the 2 cluster chain 4 5 treble_crochet in same little space slip_stitch into next space between two clusters around slip_stitch into the space with the first cluster fasten_off weave in end ddddrrrraaaawwwwssssttttrrrriiiinnnngggg chain 150
